alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:37PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Broadwater, northeastern Madison, southeastern Jefferson and northern Gallatin Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 836 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Manhattan to 11 miles southeast of Harrison. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Three Forks, Manhattan, Harrison, Norris, Bozeman Hot Springs, Gallatin Gateway, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Logan, Maudlow, Four Corners, Amsterdam, Trident, Church Hill, Willow Creek, Menard and Madison Buffalo Jump State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 277 and 321. Highway 191 between mile markers 67 and 87. Highway 287 between mile markers 57 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
